```{r}
object_list <- list()
object_list[["CMV"]] <- rat_data_CMV
object_list[["MEM"]] <- rat_data_MEM

for (i in 1:length(object_list)) {
  object_list[[i]] <- NormalizeData(object_list[[i]], verbose = F)
  object_list[[i]] <- FindVariableFeatures(object_list[[i]], selection.method = "vst", nfeatures = 2000, verbose = F)
}
```

```{r}
rat_anchors <- FindIntegrationAnchors(object.list = object_list, dims = 1:27)
```

```{r}
rat_merged<- IntegrateData(anchorset = rat_anchors, dims = 1:27)
```
